categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tervor "Riptide" Jheran served as a Captain and pilot in the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire, during the Galactic War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic. He was a famous starfighter ace who used a Fury-class Imperial interceptor in battle.
Around 3642 BBY[source?] he led a fleet to attack a Republic patrol above the planet Kovor but the Coruscant Aegis squadron was able to repel the Imperials and kill Jheran.
